snippet: Allianz late on Tuesday said Mohamed El-Erian, Chief Executive Officer at its asset management unit Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO), has resigned, but would stay on the Allianz International Executive Committee....

headline.print_headline: Mohamed El-Erian Resigns From Pimco, to Stay On at Allianz
headline.main: Mohamed El-Erian Resigns From Pimco, to Stay On at Allianz

lead_paragraph: Allianz late on Tuesday said Mohamed El-Erian, Chief Executive Officer at its asset management unit Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO), has resigned, but would stay on the Allianz International Executive Committee.
